alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 6:28PM CDT until July 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY... At 528 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gordon, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gordon, White Clay, Clinton, Pine Ridge, Intersection of Highway 87 and Craven Creek Road, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road and Mount Maria. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 94 and 109. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
